title: [K-12] Enhancing Practical Mathematics Problem-Solving Skills Through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in foundational mathematical concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment incorporating Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles in BYOD settings, utilizing synchronous/asynchronous communication tools

learning_goals: Learners can solve practical math problems using UDL-based online collaboration tools with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can improve over 80% of project deliverables based on peer feedback.
Learners can complete projects by applying at least three role-sharing and communication strategies in online collaborative learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
